snippet: On a barren block of Stanton Street, a steady flow of good-looking clients, almost all under 25, keeps Bantam hopping.
abstract: John Ortved reviews Bantam, Lower East Side nightclub with a steady flow of young, good-looking clients.
lead_paragraph: On a barren block of Stanton Street, a steady flow of good-looking clients, almost all under 25, keeps Bantam hopping.

headline.seo: Bantam, a Lower East Side Bar Where the Color Blue Sets the Tone
